summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal sewerage utility; authorizing a contract with Gellert, Griffin, Harrigan and Associates, for services of an expert and temporary nature, as a consultant to design the Seaview Avenue Interceptor Sewer and certain sewage pumping plants, as contemplated by Plan and System Ordinance No. 84391; making an appropriation from the Sewer Fund therefor, and confirming prior acts of the Board of Public Works.
